scripts.perf:dalle:live: npm run perf:reports:dir && k6 run -e MODE=dalle -e VUS=1 -e DURATION=45s -e LIVE_LOG=1 --summary-export tests/perf/reports/manual/dalle-live-summary.json --out json=tests/perf/reports/manual/dalle-live-raw.json tests/perf/load-100.js
scripts.perf:google:live: npm run perf:reports:dir && k6 run -e MODE=google -e VUS=1 -e DURATION=45s -e LIVE_LOG=1 --summary-export tests/perf/reports/manual/google-live-summary.json --out json=tests/perf/reports/manual/google-live-raw.json tests/perf/load-100.js
scripts.perf:urls:live: npm run perf:reports:dir && k6 run -e MODE=urls -e TOTAL_CALLS=10 -e INTERVAL_SECONDS=1 -e CONCURRENCY=1 -e URLS_LIMIT=12 -e URLS_INCLUDE_URL=true -e LIVE_LOG=1 --summary-export tests/perf/reports/manual/urls-live-summary.json --out json=tests/perf/reports/manual/urls-live-raw.json tests/perf/load-100.js
scripts.perf:dalle:10: npm run perf:reports:dir && k6 run -e MODE=dalle -e TOTAL_CALLS=10 -e INTERVAL_SECONDS=1 -e CONCURRENCY=10 --summary-export tests/perf/reports/manual/dalle-10-summary.json --out json=tests/perf/reports/manual/dalle-10-raw.json tests/perf/load-100.js
